overview: Nimbe is a story addressing the issues associated with drug abuse, some of the causes, how to identify and avoid such.  -  In a fictional universe comprising ten nations. Seeing the neighboring country become more and more powerful, a warlord organizes a competition to reveal the best warriors. Hearing the news, Dong Yilong, a valiant young villager decides to take up the challenge despite the doubts of his village. So begins the journey .
title: Nimbe
